name: Run Jack!
description:
Run Jack (known as the game that no one can make 1000 points) is a brazilian indie game that requires a lot of patience and attention, the goal is toreach as many points as you can, but it will have to escape the mines and not let the Jack fall. For veteran players the game difficulty resembles of Megaman.

Are you ready?

FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK FOR UPDATES- LAST UPDATE

Run Jack! Version 2.1.0

New Update - Changelog

- Added movement (back and forward) when Jack is on the ground
- Fixed bug of height of buildings
- Added new animation to the shots when they hit the buildings
- Added double jump
- Fixed gravity bugs


CREDITS

Created by Luan Ribeiro and Jorge Luís

Music by 8BITUZZ and OMNIGRAD

Design by Luan Carlos

Stage Mounting by Jorge Luís
